title: Provisions uniform throughout State
context: [ยง291C-162] Provisions uniform throughout State. This chapter shall be applicable and uniform throughout the State and in all political subdivisions therein provided that any matter not covered in this chapter relating to rules of the road may be subject to appropriate county ordinances in any county. [L 1971, c 150, pt of ยง1] Attorney General Opinions Inconsistent provisions of Maui ordinance relating to school buses superseded. Att. Gen. Op. 75-4.
